name: ViroCare™ Multi Surface Cleaner
description: ViroCare™ Multi Surface Cleaner is a powerful all-in-one, multi-surface cleaner, and is used as a stand-alone surface cleaner and deodorizer. In combination With ViroCare PLUS or ViroChem, it becomes a powerful integrated pest management system. ViroCare™ provides effective cleaning, while deodorizing areas where deep cleaning is critical to controlling the hazards of cross-contamination on high touch surfaces. ViroCare™ eliminates unwanted odors while preparing surfaces for the application of a degreaser or registered disinfectant intended to kill bio-film.
